content.html: I took Taco to the vet today. They made it clear that his pain issues are now chronic. I tucked that thought away for most of the day, but it came back to me as I took him on his late walk just now. He’s getting old and I don’t know how I’m going to be able to handle that.
content.value:
I took Taco to the vet today. They made it clear that his pain issues are now chronic. I tucked that thought away for most of the day, but it came back to me as I took him on his late walk just now.

He’s getting old and I don’t know how I’m going to be able to handle that.
